original: LANDIN,, Jolin Anton, Grosshandlare, Malmö, f Mmö 8/12 84 av skom.m F L o Martha Jonasson, gin Anna Olsson. Borgarsk Mmö. Anst fma Andersson & Co 99—13, start tills m Ernst Lundbladh fma Landin & Lund-bladh 14, ens inneh sed. 29. Styr.led Mmö kolonialv.gr :s frn.
translated: LANDIN, Jolin Anton, Merchant, Malmö, born in Malmö on August 8th, 1884, to shoemaker F L and Martha Jonasson, their only child. Belongs to the bourgeois class in Malmö. Employed at Andersson & Co from 1899 to 1913, then co-founded Landin & Lundbladh in 1914 with Ernst Lundbladh, remaining the sole owner since 1929. Serves as a board member of the Malmö Colonization Cooperative Society from [unspecified year].

memberOf.name: Landin & Lundbladh
memberOf.description: Co-founded with Ernst Lundbladh in 1914 and remained the sole owner since 1929.
